tour_uzbekistan.title: UZBEKISTAN & THE SILK ROAD
tour_uzbekistan.overview: JOURNEY THROUGH THE HEART OF CENTRAL ASIA AND DISCOVER UZBEKISTAN, WITH ITS RICH HISTORY AND CONNECTION TO THE FAMOUS SILK ROAD. EVERY STEP REVEALS CULTURAL CONNECTIONS WITH THE PAST, AND YOU WILL EXPERIENCE A HISTORICAL THEATRICAL PERFORMANCE.

1.title: UK TO TASHKENT
1.description: FLIGHT TO TASHKENT AND OVERNIGHT STAY.

3.title: TASHKENT - KHIVA
3.description: MORNING FLIGHT AND EXPLORE KHIVA’S OLD TOWN.

4.title: KHIVA - BUKHARA
4.description: DRIVE THROUGH THE DESERT TO BUKHARA.

5.title: BUKHARA
5.description: FULL DAY EXPLORING BUKHARA’S HISTORICAL SITES.

6.title: BUKHARA
6.description: FREE DAY TO EXPLORE BUKHARA AT YOUR PACE.

8.title: SAMARKAND
8.description: DISCOVER REGISTAN SQUARE AND ANCIENT SITES.

10.title: SAMARKAND - TASHKENT
10.description: RETURN TO TASHKENT AND EVENING FAREWELL.

solo_travel.title: THE TRUSTED EXPERTS FOR SOLO HOLIDAYS
solo_travel.description: SINCE 2000, WE’VE BEEN BRINGING PEOPLE TOGETHER FOR UNFORGETTABLE SOLO HOLIDAYS. FROM EXOTIC DESTINATIONS TO HIDDEN GEMS, OUR TOURS CREATE LASTING MEMORIES AND CONNECTIONS.

tips.title: SOLO TRAVEL TIPS
tips.description: DISCOVER OUR TOP TEN TIPS TO MAKE YOUR SOLO ADVENTURE UNFORGETTABLE. FROM PLANNING TO STAYING CONNECTED, FEEL SAFE AND CONFIDENT WHILE EXPLORING.

last_minute.title: LAST-MINUTE TRIPS

india.title: INSPIRATIONAL INDIA
india.description: EXPERIENCE THE MAGIC OF INDIA WITH OUR SPECIAL ANNIVERSARY TOUR. LIMITED SPACES—DON’T MISS OUT.

beach_escapes.title: BEACH ESCAPES
beach_escapes.description: RELAX ON SANDY SHORES WITH OUR EXCLUSIVE BEACH ESCAPES TAILORED FOR SOLO TRAVELERS.

city_adventures.title: CITY ADVENTURES
city_adventures.description: EXPLORE ICONIC CITIES WORLDWIDE WITH EXPERT-GUIDED TOURS FOR SOLO TRAVELERS.

wildlife_safaris.title: WILDLIFE SAFARIS

about.title: HOLIDAYS THAT LET YOU BE JUST YOU
about.paragraph1: On a Just You holiday, you're free to enjoy the experience. We'll take care of everything else.
about.paragraph2: No worrying about tickets or schedules. Just enjoy your destination, relax and make friends with like-minded people.
about.paragraph3: With 25 years of experience and a Holiday Director by your side, you’ll be free to do whatever feels... Just You.

balkan_explorer.title: BALKAN EXPLORER
balkan_explorer.description: AN IN-DEPTH EXPLORATION OF FOUR COUNTRIES IN EASTERN EUROPE WITH HISTORY, CULTURE, AND VIBRANT CITIES.

switzerland_railways.title: SWITZERLAND'S SCENIC RAILWAYS
switzerland_railways.description: A SWISS WINTER ADVENTURE, COMBINING RAIL JOURNEYS AND ALPINE SCENERY.
